channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- visionOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- visionOS

item.title: CVE-2024-23246|2024-06-06T14:04:44.881Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, tvOS 17.4. An app may be able to break out of its sandbox.
